banner.text: A Lightsaberâ€™s blade is powered by a kyber crystal. This Lightsaber once belonged to Luke Skywalker, and then Rey. Time to add its distinctive sound.

steps.grabBlockCopy: Set the lights on your Force Kit to match the Lightsaber. Drag the set feedback LEDs block with your mouse or finger into the code space.

steps.text: Rey's Lightsaber houses a blue kyber crystal. Move your hand to see the blue lights on your kit get brighter.

steps.grabBlockCopy: Add the Lightsaber's hum using the Speaker: loop block. Drag it into the code space.
Set the volume of the hum so it gets quieter the closer your hand is to the sensors. Drag the Speaker: volume block into the code space.
steps.connectCopy: Connect it inside of the Every 1 frames loop.

steps.grabBlockCopy: Pick up the Force Kit: height block and drag it into the code space.
steps.connectCopy: Connect it to the Speaker: volume block.

steps.text: Move your hand up and down to hear the Lightsaber's hum change volume.

banner.text: Huh, you did it, well done. But do you have the focus to wield your Lightsaber like a Jedi?

tooltips.text:
The Force Kit: height block measures how close your hand is to the sensors.

0 is your hand covering the sensors, and 100 is when it's furthest away.
